title: My client is oddly big now.
body:
http://imgur.com/a/CWPQ4

I got a new computer, downloaded league, and now its all wonky. Its larger then before.

replies.body: You should be able to mouse over the corners and hold it to scale the window back.  You can also tap Ctrl + Down Arrow to scale down.  I hope that helps, and grats on your new rig!
Thanks! I scaled the window back so the shop has arrows to scroll now, but its ok.
